member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.DrawImporter
member.summary: DrawImporter lets you import an OpenOffice Draw document into a Diagram or DiagramDocument object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.DrawImporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DrawImporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.DrawImporter.Import(System.String)
member.summary: Imports the specified OpenOffice Draw document into a new DiagramDocument, where each Draw page is imported into a separate DiagramPage of the DiagramDocument.
member.param: A string specifying the path to the .odg file.
member.returns: A DiagramDocument containing the imported OpenOffice drawing.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.DrawImporter.Import(System.String,MindFusion.Diagramming.DiagramDocument)
member.summary: Imports the specified OpenOffice Draw document into an existing DiagramDocument, where each Draw page is imported into a separate DiagramPage of the DiagramDocument.
member.param: A string specifying the path to the .odg file.
A DiagramDocument into which to import the OpenOffice drawing.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.DrawImporter.Import(System.String,MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram)
member.summary: Imports the specified OpenOffice Draw document into the specified Diagram.
member.param: A string specifying the path to the .odg file.
A Diagram into which to import the OpenOffice drawing.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.DrawImporter.PagesPerRow
member.summary: Gets or sets how many Draw pages to import on a row before offsetting the import location vertically.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure
member.summary: Represents amounts of specific units.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Measure class.
member.param: The number of pixels represented by the new object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.#ctor(System.Double,MindFusion.Diagramming.MeasureUnit)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Measure class.
member.param: The amount represented by the new object.
The measure unit of the new object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Measure class.
member.param: A string representing the amount and, optionally, units of measure.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.#ctor(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Measure class.
member.param: A string representing the amount and, optionally, units of measure.
An IFormatProvider object that is used to interpret the specified value.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.ToString
member.summary: Object.ToString override.
member.returns: The string representation of the current object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the current measure.
member.param: An IFormatProvider object that is used to format the amount.
member.returns: The string representation of the current object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Object.Equals override.
member.param: The object to compare to this measure.
member.returns: true if the specified object is a Measure equal to this object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.Equals(MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified measure is equal to the current measure.
member.param: The object to compare to this measure.
member.returns: true if the specified measure is equal to this object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.GetHashCode
member.summary: Object.GetHashCode override.
member.returns: A hash code for the current object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.op_Implicit(System.Double)~MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure
member.summary: Converts the specified double value to a Measure object representing the same amount of pixels.
member.param: The value to convert.
member.returns: A Measure object representing the specified double value.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.op_Implicit(System.String)~MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure
member.summary: Converts the specified string to a Measure object.
member.param: The value to convert.
member.returns: A Measure object representing the specified string.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.op_Equality(MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure,MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure)
member.summary: Compares two Measure objects for equality.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if the two specified objects are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.op_Inequality(MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure,MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure)
member.summary: Compares two Measure objects for inequality.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: true if the two specified objects are not equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.op_Addition(MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds the specified amount to the specified Measure object.
member.param: The Measure object to add to.
The amount to add.
member.returns: A new Measure object representing the new amount, in the same unit as the original object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.op_Subtraction(MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure,System.Double)
member.summary: Subtracts the specified amount from the specified Measure object.
member.param: The Measure object to subtract from.
The amount to subtract.
member.returns: A new Measure object representing the new amount, in the same unit as the original object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.ConvertTo(MindFusion.Diagramming.MeasureUnit,System.Object)
member.summary: Converts the amount represented by the current object to the specified unit.
member.param: A MeasureUnit object representing the unit to convert to.
When converting between logical and device units this should be a Graphics or IGraphics object that provides device resolution information; otherwise this parameter is ignored.
member.returns: A new Measure object that represents the original amount in the specified unit.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.Unit
member.summary: Gets the unit of measure of the current object.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Import.Measure.Amount
member.summary: Gets the amount represented by the current object.
